sqlMap.select:
SELECT f_emcproject_id as "f_emcprojectId", f_company_id as "f_companyId", f_emcproject_name as "f_emcprojectName", f_emcproject_desc as "f_emcprojectDesc", f_emcproject_address as "f_emcprojectAddress", f_emcproject_lon as "f_emcprojectLon", f_emcproject_lat as "f_emcprojectLat", f_emcproject_constructdate as "f_emcprojectConstructdate", f_emcproject_commissioningdate as "f_emcprojectCommissioningdate", f_emcproject_responsible as "f_emcprojectResponsible", f_emcproject_constructunit as "f_emcprojectConstructunit", f_emcproject_startdate as "f_emcprojectStartdate", f_emcproject_enddate as "f_emcprojectEnddate", f_emcproject_cycletype as "f_emcprojectCycletype", f_emcproject_totalcyclenumber as "f_emcprojectTotalcyclenumber", f_emcproject_type as "f_emcprojectType", f_emcproject_res_email as "f_emcprojectResEmail", f_emcproject_res_phonenumber as "f_emcprojectResPhonenumber", f_emcproject_customerpm as "f_emcprojectCustomerpm", f_emcproject_customerpm_email as "f_emcprojectCustomerpmEmail", f_emcproject_customerpm_phonenumber as "f_emcprojectCustomerpmPhonenumber", f_emcproject_initpage as "f_emcprojectInitpage" FROM .t_emcproject WHERE 1=1
f_emcproject_id = #f_emcprojectId#
$orderBy$
f_emcproject_id asc

SELECT f_emcproject_id as "f_emcprojectId", f_company_id as "f_companyId", f_emcproject_name as "f_emcprojectName", f_emcproject_desc as "f_emcprojectDesc", f_emcproject_address as "f_emcprojectAddress", f_emcproject_lon as "f_emcprojectLon", f_emcproject_lat as "f_emcprojectLat", f_emcproject_constructdate as "f_emcprojectConstructdate", f_emcproject_commissioningdate as "f_emcprojectCommissioningdate", f_emcproject_responsible as "f_emcprojectResponsible", f_emcproject_constructunit as "f_emcprojectConstructunit", f_emcproject_startdate as "f_emcprojectStartdate", f_emcproject_enddate as "f_emcprojectEnddate", f_emcproject_cycletype as "f_emcprojectCycletype", f_emcproject_totalcyclenumber as "f_emcprojectTotalcyclenumber", f_emcproject_type as "f_emcprojectType", f_emcproject_res_email as "f_emcprojectResEmail", f_emcproject_res_phonenumber as "f_emcprojectResPhonenumber", f_emcproject_customerpm as "f_emcprojectCustomerpm", f_emcproject_customerpm_email as "f_emcprojectCustomerpmEmail", f_emcproject_customerpm_phonenumber as "f_emcprojectCustomerpmPhonenumber", f_emcproject_initpage as "f_emcprojectInitpage" FROM .t_emcproject WHERE 1=1
f_emcproject_name = #f_emcprojectName#
$orderBy$
f_emcproject_id asc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO .t_emcproject (f_emcproject_id, f_company_id, f_emcproject_name, f_emcproject_desc, f_emcproject_address, f_emcproject_lon, f_emcproject_lat, f_emcproject_constructdate, f_emcproject_commissioningdate, f_emcproject_responsible, f_emcproject_constructunit, f_emcproject_startdate, f_emcproject_enddate, f_emcproject_cycletype, f_emcproject_totalcyclenumber, f_emcproject_type, f_emcproject_res_email, f_emcproject_res_phonenumber, f_emcproject_customerpm, f_emcproject_customerpm_email, f_emcproject_customerpm_phonenumber, f_emcproject_initpage ) VALUES (#f_emcprojectId#, #f_companyId#, #f_emcprojectName#, #f_emcprojectDesc#, #f_emcprojectAddress#, #f_emcprojectLon#, #f_emcprojectLat#, #f_emcprojectConstructdate#, #f_emcprojectCommissioningdate#, #f_emcprojectResponsible#, #f_emcprojectConstructunit#, #f_emcprojectStartdate#, #f_emcprojectEnddate#, #f_emcprojectCycletype#, #f_emcprojectTotalcyclenumber#, #f_emcprojectType#, #f_emcprojectResEmail#, #f_emcprojectResPhonenumber#, #f_emcprojectCustomerpm#, #f_emcprojectCustomerpmEmail#, #f_emcprojectCustomerpmPhonenumber#, #f_emcprojectInitpage#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE .t_emcproject SET f_emcproject_name = #f_emcprojectName#, f_emcproject_desc = #f_emcprojectDesc#, f_emcproject_address = #f_emcprojectAddress#, f_emcproject_constructdate = #f_emcprojectConstructdate#, f_emcproject_commissioningdate = #f_emcprojectCommissioningdate#, f_emcproject_responsible = #f_emcprojectResponsible#, f_emcproject_constructunit = #f_emcprojectConstructunit#, f_emcproject_startdate = #f_emcprojectStartdate#, f_emcproject_enddate = #f_emcprojectEnddate#, f_emcproject_cycletype = #f_emcprojectCycletype#, f_emcproject_totalcyclenumber = #f_emcprojectTotalcyclenumber#, f_emcproject_type = #f_emcprojectType#, f_emcproject_res_email = #f_emcprojectResEmail#, f_emcproject_res_phonenumber = #f_emcprojectResPhonenumber#, f_emcproject_customerpm = #f_emcprojectCustomerpm#, f_emcproject_customerpm_email = #f_emcprojectCustomerpmEmail#, f_emcproject_customerpm_phonenumber = #f_emcprojectCustomerpmPhonenumber#, f_emcproject_initpage = #f_emcprojectInitpage# WHERE f_emcproject_id = #f_emcprojectId#
UPDATE t_emcproject SET f_emcproject_lon = #f_emcprojectLon#, f_emcproject_lat = #f_emcprojectLat# WHERE f_emcproject_id = #f_emcprojectId#
UPDATE t_emcproject SET f_company_id = #f_companyId# WHERE f_emcproject_id = #f_emcprojectId#
